title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mojtin, Slovakia
content:
Photo submitted by Martin Kovac, “Taken on Rohata skala near the village of Mojtin.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that public spaces and parks may […]

author: Kristi Benedict
